name: amazee.io helm charts
tagline: A collection of Helm charts for Lagoon and associated services.
body:
# amazee.io Helm charts

This repository contains helm charts related to [Lagoon](https://github.com/amazeeio/lagoon/).

## Usage

```
helm repo add amazeeio https://amazeeio.github.io/charts/
```

See individual chart directories for usage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
